description: Supports damaging skills you use yourself, draining the life from one of your Minions on use in order to boost the skill's damage. Only takes effect if you have a Minion with enough life to drain the full amount.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills remove 100% of your maximum Life from a nearby Minion on use to deal 40% more damage

name:
Mobility


Support
description: Supports skills that can be used while moving, allowing you to move faster while using them.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 20% less Damage
40% less Movement Speed penalty while using Supported Skills

name:
Momentum


Support
description: Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal more damage if you move a sufficient distance while using the skill. Teleportation does not count towards the distance travelled.
explicit_mods: After moving at least 2 metres during a single use of a Supported Skill, the rest of that use deals 40% more Damage

name:
More Duration


Support
description: Supports any skill that has a duration, making that duration longer.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 40% more Skill Effect Duration

name:
Multiple Charge


Support
description: Supports skills that can generate Charges, giving them a chance to generate an additional Charge when they do so.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 30% chance to grant an additional Charge

name:
Multiple Poison


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing it to inflict an extra Poison an enemies but shortening the duration of those Poisons.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills can Poison enemies an additional time
Supported Skills have 30% less Poison Duration

name:
Multiple Projectiles


Support
description: Supports Projectile skills, making them fire extra Projectiles. Also lowers Attack and Cast speed of supported skills, as well as lessening their damage.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 20% less Damage
Supported Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles
Supported Skills have 20% less Attack and Cast Speed

name:
Multiple Trap


Support
description: Supports trap skills, making them throw extra traps in a line.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills throw up to 2 additional Traps
Supported Skills deal 75% less Damage
Supported Skills can have up to 3 additional Traps placed at a time

name:
Neural Overload


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies. Nearby enemies are marked when they are Primed for Electrocution, and hitting a marked enemy with a supported skill will Electrocute them.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills Electrocute Primed enemies on Hit

name:
Overcharge


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making its Shocks more effective but last for a shorter duration.
explicit_mods: 75% increased Effect of Shocks from Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 50% less Shock Duration on Enemies

name:
Overpower


Support
description: Supports any skill that hits enemies, causing it to build up Stun more quickly.
explicit_mods: Hits with Supported Skills cause 80% more Stun buildup

name:
Perpetual Charge


Support
description: Supports skills that consume Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charges on use, giving them a chance not to remove each Charge while still gaining the benefits of consuming them.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 35% chance to not remove Charges but still count as consuming them

name:
Physical Mastery


Support
description: Supports Physical skills, granting them an additional level.
explicit_mods: +1 to Level of Supported Physical Skills

name:
Pierce


Support
description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Pierce an enemy but deal less damage after doing so.
explicit_mods: Projectiles from Supported Skills Pierce an Enemy
Projectiles from Supported Skills deal 30% less Damage if they've Pierced an enemy

name:
Pin


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing its Physical damage to Pin enemies but making it unable to Stun.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills do not cause Stun buildup
Physical Damage from Supported Skill is Pinning

name:
Poison Chance


Support
description: Supports any skill that hits enemies, giving it a chance to Poison enemies.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 60% chance to Poison on Hit

name:
Precision


Support
description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you gain increased Accuracy while the Skill is active.
explicit_mods: 30% increased Accuracy Rating while a Supported Skill is active

name:
Pulverise


Support
description: Supports melee attack skills, making them slower but more powerful.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 20% increased Area of Effect
Supported Skills have 15% less Attack Speed
Supported Skills deal 20% more Melee Area Damage

name:
Rage


Support
description: Supports Melee Attacks, causing them to grant Rage on Hit.
explicit_mods: Gain 3 Rage on Melee Hit

name:
Rageforged


Support
description: Supports any damaging skill that you use or trigger yourself, causing it to consume Rage to deal more damage. IF you don't have enough Rage to consume, the damage bonus will not apply.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills consume 10 Rage if possible to deal 35% more Damage

name:
Raging Cry


Support
description: Supports Warcry skills, causing them to grant you Rage on use.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills grant 4 Rage per 5 Power of enemies in range

name:
Ranged Combat


Support
description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage from farther away.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 35% more Attack Damage to enemies further than 7 metres from you, scaling down to no bonus at 3.5 metres or closer

name:
Reduced Cooldown


Support
description: Supports skills with cooldowns, increasing the rate at which those cooldowns recover.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 30% increased cooldown recover rate

name:
Reload Speed


Support
description: [DNT] Reload Speed Support
explicit_mods: 100% increased Crossbow Reload Speed

name:
Ritualistic Curse


Support
description: Supports Curse skills, causing them to cover a larger area but take longer to Curse enemies.
explicit_mods: Curse zones from Supported
Skills erupt after 30% reduced delay
Supported Skills have 50% increased Area of Effect

name:
Rupture


Support
description: Supports skills that Hit Enemies. Supported skills Aggravate Bleeding on Hitting Heavily Stunned Enemies.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills Aggravate Bleeding on Hitting Heavy Stunned Enemies

name:
Ruthless


Support
description: Supports Attacks, causing repeated uses to be more effective at Stunning enemies.
explicit_mods: Every fifth use of this Attack causes 500% more Stun buildup

name:
Searing Flame


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing inflicted Ignites to deal more damage but its Hits to deal less damage.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 25% less Damage with Hits
75% more Effect of Ignite from Supported Skills

name:
Second Wind


Support
description:
Supports skills with cooldowns, giving them extra uses of that cooldown.
Cannot support triggered skills.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 50% less Cooldown Recovery Rate
Supported Skills have twice as many Cooldown Uses

name:
Shock Chance


Support
description: Supports any skill that hits enemies, giving it a chance to shock enemies.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 20% chance to Shock

name:
Shock Siphon


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Energy Shield when it kills a Shocked enemy.
explicit_mods: Recover 4% of Energy Shield when a Supported Skill deals a Killing Blow to a Shocked Enemy

name:
Slower Projectiles


Support
description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel more slowly.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have 30% less Projectile Speed

name:
Soul Drain


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Mana when it Culls an enemy.
explicit_mods: Recover 12% of Mana over four seconds when Supported Skills Cull an Enemy

name:
Spell Echo


Support
description: Supports Spells that affect an area around you or a target location. Supported Spells echo, causing their effects to happen again after a short delay. Cannot support Channelling skills or Remote skills.
explicit_mods: Supported Spells Echo once
Supported Skills have 30% less Cast Speed
Echoes from supported Spells have 30% more Area of Effect

name:
Splinter


Support
description: Supports Skills that Hit Enemies, causing those Hits to Break Armour based on a portion of Physical Damage dealt.
explicit_mods: Break Armour equal to 15% of Physical Damage dealt by Supported Skill

name:
Stomping Ground


Support
description: Supports Travel skills, causing your footsteps to crack the earth and emit damaging shockwaves while using the skill.
explicit_mods: Triggers a Shockwave when you take a step while using Supported Skills

name:
Stormfire


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, prolonging Shocks they inflict on Ignited enemies.
explicit_mods: Shocks from Supported Skills do not expire on Ignited enemies

name:
Swift Affliction


Support
description: Supports any skill that deals damage, causing it to deal more damage over time but have a shorter duration.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 35% more non-Ailment Damage over Time
20% less Duration of Supported Skills and Damaging Ailments they inflict

name:
Unbreakable


Support
description: Supports any skill that you can use, making you harder to Stun while using it.
explicit_mods: 200% more Stun Threshold while using Supported Skills

name:
Unleash


Support
description: Supports Spells you cast yourself, making their effect reoccur when cast. Cannot support Channelling Skills or Skills with a Cooldown.
explicit_mods: Supported Spells gain a Seal every 200% of cast time, to a maximum of 2 Seals
Supported Spells are Unsealed when cast, and their effects Reoccur for each Seal lost
Supported Skills deal 50% less Damage when Reoccurring

name:
Vitality


Support
description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain Life Regeneration while the Skill is active.
explicit_mods: Regenerate 1.5% of Life per second while a Supported Skill is active

name:
Volley


Support
description: Supports skills that fire projectiles from the user. Does not affect projectiles fired from other locations as secondary effects.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles
Supported Skills also fire Projectiles from up to 4 points on each side of you
Supported Skills deal 20% less Projectile Damage

name:
Weapon Elemental Damage


Support
description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more Weapon Elemental Damage.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 25% more Weapon Elemental Damage

name:
Wildfire


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, Spreading Ignites it inflicts to nearby enemies after a delay.
explicit_mods: Ignites you inflict Spread to other enemies that stay within 1.5 metres for 2 seconds

name:
Wildshards


Support
description: Supports Spell Skills that fire Projectiles. Supported Skills have a chance to fire many additional Projectiles in a circle.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills have a 20% chance to fire 8 additional Projectiles in a circle

name:
Wind Wave


Support
description: Supports any skill that you can use, triggering a blast of wind that Knocks Back enemies if you are Stunned while using it.
explicit_mods: Trigger Wind Wave when Stunned while using Supported Skills

name:
Window of Opportunity


Support
description: Supports Channelling skills that have special effects if released with perfect timing, causing them to deal much more damage if released with perfect timing but reducing the perfect timing window.
explicit_mods: Supported Skills deal 50% more Damage when released with perfect timing
Supported Skills have a 25% shorter perfect timing window

name:
Withering Touch


Support
description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to Wither enemies on Hit.
explicit_mods: Withered last 4 seconds
Supported Skills deal 50% less Damage
Supported Skills inflict Withered on Hit with Chaos Damage
